abstract: The Obama campaign says it mistakenly included Senator Bob Casey, instead of a Philadelphia lawyer, in a list of the president's "bundlers" last week.
snippet: The Obama campaign says it mistakenly included Senator Bob Casey, instead of a Philadelphia lawyer, in a list of the president's "bundlers" last week.
lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama is the only presidential candidate who, each quarter, voluntarily releases his list of "bundlers," wealthy individuals who gather checks from friends and family members.
